title: Sampler, 1812
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, cotton foundation
Technique: cross, square, tent and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Upper portion shows a house with trees and birds; lower portion depicts Adam and Eve with small detached motifs including animals, trees, houses, flowers; signatures; enclosed in vine-patterned border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1812.
1812. Medium: silk embroidery, cotton foundation
Technique: cross, square, tent and satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-76.
